attributes.action: Stop school work being set at home.
attributes.additional_details: It causes too much stress and it is unfair on those who do not have support.
attributes.background: Stop school work being set at home.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about schools setting work for children to do at home, however it's not clear whether you mean online learning schools are required to provide during the Covid-19 pandemic, or traditional homework.

You may wish to sign these petitions which call for related actions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566793.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551955
